acceptedAnswer.text: Sodium is a highly sophisticated proxy used for evading internet censorship or accessing websites in a controlled sandbox using the power of service workers and more!

mainEntity.name: How do I unblock sites using Sodium?

acceptedAnswer.text: Simply head to an official site featuring Sodium such as Holy Unblocker or Incognito! You can also self-host Sodium on your own web server for maximum privacy.

mainEntity.name: What if Sodium is blocked or not working?
